Reviews.Title: “Great hotel. Good location to visit Coyoacan!”
Reviews.Author: kanchandayo
Reviews.Content: selected hotel bit cheaper holiday stayed 2 nights traffic street front hotel quiet confortable front desk service clean confortable typical inconvenient rustic hotel mexico taxi visit touristic sites mexico city recommendable hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good price - convenient only to metro”
Reviews.Author: NCtravelz
Reviews.Content: didnt research near downtown saturday market wasnt hotel near highway cant walk theres taking train cab conveniently located metro stop makes easy train zocalo day hotel fine theres mediocre restaurant lobby upgraded jacuzzi nice day sightseeing football team staying hotel ran halls night started banging doors crack dawn stay price holiday inns df location tour buses

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful inside, terrible outside”
Reviews.Author: LindaAt
Reviews.Content: booked reservation hotel named holiday inn explore recommended towns neighboring san angel reserved 2 nights disappointed taxi pulled hotel main highway dicey neighborhood hotel nice clean service excellent stay tourist explore plazas quaint restaurants nearby san angel 10 minute taxi drive hotel perfect hotel taxi van san angel cost 1400 returned local taxi cost 450 dont hotels taxi help ripoff
